name: Mouse And Cheese Tactics "The Mouse Ops"
name_original: Mouse And Cheese Tactics "The Mouse Ops"
description:
Missions (11-20) for those who already completed the Training Missions !

KEY FEATURES

-Be strategic to collect the cheese.

-10 individual stages.

-One bit pixel art.

-Great music.

-Infinite replayability.

-Arcade style.

CONTROLS

Move Left: A, Left Arrow. 

Move Right: D, Right Arrow.

Jump: Space.

START: Enter, Space.

Quit: ESC.

The game should also work with an Xbox Controller.

If you have enjoyed the game, I'd appreciate your support by buying me a coffee too ! Thanks !
